channel.title: How about another beat the clock?
channel.description:
I just got auxy right before the most recent beat the clock started.
I wonder if or when there will be another. They are a great way to showcase great work and creative ideas AND build this community.
Especially since 4.0 came out. I bet there is some AMAZING work in progress.
Am I the only one? Maybe I missed that particular wave.

item.title: How about another beat the clock?
item.dc:creator: headlights
item.description:
They do a heck of a lot of work. Any break they get they deserve!

Read full topic

item.title: How about another beat the clock?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Give @Auxy and @Fredrik some time, they’re the only 2 developers in Auxy right now and the new automation update is somewhat holding them back until the next Beat the Clock starts.
